Class EntityFilterBuilder

de.eldoria.schematicsanitizer.sanitizer.filter.builder.EntityFilterBuilder
public class EntityFilterBuilder extends Object
A class for building an EntityFilter object.

      public EntityFilterBuilder removeNonCreatures(boolean removeNonCreatures)
      Sets the flag to remove non-creature entities in the EntityFilterBuilder.
      Parameters:
      removeNonCreatures - true to remove non-creature entities, false otherwise

      the current EntityFilterBuilder instance
